metadata.title: CVE-2011-3825 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Zend Framework 1.11.3 in Zend Server CE 5.1.0 allows remote attackers toobtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, whichreveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated byValidate.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
